Here is the list of signs and their scores at $line, along with a brief description of why they got that score:

2. Taurus - 8.5/10 - Practicality and reliability shine through, but can be too attached to material possessions.
3. Gemini - 6.5/10 - Quick wit and adaptability are major strengths, but lack of focus can hinder progress.
4. Cancer - 9/10 - Emotional intelligence and nurturing nature make them a natural caregiver, but moodiness can be a challenge.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can come across as arrogant or dominating if not careful.
6. Virgo - 7.5/10 - Attention to detail and hard work are impressive, but perfectionism can lead to burnout.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Balance and harmony are key strengths, but indecisiveness can be a weakness.
8. Scorpio - 9.5/10 - Passionate intensity and intuition make them highly perceptive, but can come across as intense or brooding if not managed.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventure-seeking and philosophical nature are inspiring, but lack of follow-through can be a problem.
10. Capricorn - 8.5/10 - Ambition and discipline are impressive, but can lead to rigidity or people-pleasing if not balanced.
11. Aquarius - 6.5/10 - Innovative and humanitarian, but detachment can make it hard for others to get close.
12. Pisces - 9/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, with a strong connection to the spiritual realm, but emotional fragility can be a challenge.
Note: These scores are subjective and based on general astrological insights, not definitive or scientifically proven facts!
